import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import '../../component/grid.css'; import '../header/header.css'; import '../../component/style.css'; import logo from '../img/logo.png'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const [theLoaisMobile, setTheLoaisMobile] = useState([]); const [loadingMobile, setLoadingMobile] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchTheLoaisMobile = async () => { setLoadingMobile(true); try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/theloais'); setTheLoaisMobile(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Lỗi khi tải danh mục thể loại (mobile):", error); } finally { setLoadingMobile(false); } }; fetchTheLoaisMobile(); }, []); return (
